summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account as of November 30, 2013. It includes information on deposits, outgoing transfers, and service charges, indicating significant financial activity during the period.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $572,921.98 as of November 1, 2013.
A total of $200,000 was transferred out of the account to First Bank, Puerto Rico.
The ending balance of the account as of November 30, 2013, was $52,921.98.
Service charges included $50.00 for non-sufficient funds (NSF) during the statement period.
The document is marked as confidential and subject to legal restrictions.
